subject: Make Identity API v3 only job default
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2015-11-04 02:55:08.000000000', 'files': ['zuul/layout.yaml', 'jenkins/jobs/devstack-gate.yaml'], 'message': 'Make Identity API v3 only job default

There is an experimental gate job for Identity API
v3 only for DevStack and Tempest repositories,
where the Identity v2 API is disabled.

That job aims to verify that Tempest tests can run
with the described configuration, and consequently
services are compatible with the Identity API v3.

In addition, there are two job templates for
running Tempest tests (named *keystonev3-full)
using the Identity API v3 that have the same goal.

Now that the Identity API v3 only job is passing
(see change #213430 as an example), the other two
jobs can be removed in favor of it.

Change-Id: Ie596494df384de024ddeaadbd641f4b93dce30e0
'}]
commit_message:
Make Identity API v3 only job default

There is an experimental gate job for Identity API
v3 only for DevStack and Tempest repositories,
where the Identity v2 API is disabled.

That job aims to verify that Tempest tests can run
with the described configuration, and consequently
services are compatible with the Identity API v3.

In addition, there are two job templates for
running Tempest tests (named *keystonev3-full)
using the Identity API v3 that have the same goal.

Now that the Identity API v3 only job is passing
(see change #213430 as an example), the other two
jobs can be removed in favor of it.

Change-Id: Ie596494df384de024ddeaadbd641f4b93dce30e0

subject: Run only volume related tests in tempest-dsvm-full-bdd job
revisions:
[{'number': 2, 'created': '2015-11-03 11:30:01.000000000', 'files': ['jenkins/jobs/devstack-gate.yaml'], 'message': 'Run only volume related tests in tempest-dsvm-full-bdd job

Set TEMPEST_CONCURRENCY=1 for tempest-dsvm-full-bdd job

We've got a limited loopback devices so we can't run this
job with concurrency.

Also to decrease job execution time this patch set
DEVSTACK_GATE_TEMPEST_REGEX="volume" variable.

Change-Id: Ie79acbd453f52d2dd8736ac69cce6fdde7c63071
'}]
commit_message:
Run only volume related tests in tempest-dsvm-full-bdd job

Set TEMPEST_CONCURRENCY=1 for tempest-dsvm-full-bdd job

We've got a limited loopback devices so we can't run this
job with concurrency.

Also to decrease job execution time this patch set
DEVSTACK_GATE_TEMPEST_REGEX="volume" variable.

Change-Id: Ie79acbd453f52d2dd8736ac69cce6fdde7c63071

revisions:
[{'number': 4, 'created': '2015-09-30 22:43:51.000000000', 'files': ['openstackclient/tests/identity/v3/fakes.py', 'openstackclient/identity/v3/credential.py', 'openstackclient/tests/identity/v3/test_credential.py'], 'message': 'Mark arguments for 'credential' commands as required

According to the [1], 'user_id', 'type', and 'blob' are all required
arguments for 'credential set' but the code treats them as optional. Set the
'required' flag and remove logic supporting missing arguments.

[1]: https://github.com/openstack/keystone-specs/blob/master/api/v3/identity-api-v3.rst#credentials-v3credentials "spec"

Change-Id: I597c9616ad744385fc6dd92379feb03daec54458
Closes-Bug: #1418837
'}]
commit_message:
Mark arguments for 'credential' commands as required

According to the [1], 'user_id', 'type', and 'blob' are all required
arguments for 'credential set' but the code treats them as optional. Set the
'required' flag and remove logic supporting missing arguments.

[1]: https://github.com/openstack/keystone-specs/blob/master/api/v3/identity-api-v3.rst#credentials-v3credentials "spec"

Change-Id: I597c9616ad744385fc6dd92379feb03daec54458
Closes-Bug: #1418837

commit_message:
Remove lbaas v1 job from neutron, remove v2 from neutron gate

- Neutron does not need to gate on v2, check queue is good enough.

subject: SQL: Fix event-list with multiple trait query filters
revisions:
[{'number': 3, 'created': '2015-10-09 12:25:19.000000000', 'files': ['ceilometer/event/storage/impl_sqlalchemy.py', 'ceilometer/tests/api/v2/test_event_scenarios.py'], 'message': 'SQL: Fix event-list with multiple trait query filters

When querying events with two different *request_id* trait filters, we
expect the response body is an empty, but it may be not. That is because
the multiple trait query filters are not combined correctly.

Change-Id: Id034b01cff891e928625bb0fa668c1ebd7dcf742
Closes-Bug: #1489062
(cherry picked from commit bebfe64575cbede4798b7b5f0c5ef39b725f5092)
'}]
commit_message:
SQL: Fix event-list with multiple trait query filters

When querying events with two different *request_id* trait filters, we
expect the response body is an empty, but it may be not. That is because
the multiple trait query filters are not combined correctly.

Change-Id: Id034b01cff891e928625bb0fa668c1ebd7dcf742
Closes-Bug: #1489062
(cherry picked from commit bebfe64575cbede4798b7b5f0c5ef39b725f5092)

[{'number': 4, 'created': '2015-11-04 11:21:30.000000000', 'files': ['freezer/job.py', 'freezer/backup.py', 'freezer/restore.py', 'freezer/validator.py', 'freezer/osclients.py'], 'message': "Fixes for cinder backup

1) cinder was using cindernative_vol_id instead of cinder_vol_id
2) cinder client has default endpoint 'publicURL' and should be respected if no new endpoint was provided
3) cinder restore had wrong order of arguments in restore_cinder and restore_cinder_by_glance
4) cinder upload_to_image returns response tuple instead of image, now extracts id from tuple and gets image
5) glance data length sometimes 0, changed to get size from glance.images.get
6) fix validator to allow restore and backup cinder and cinder_native without any path

Change-Id: I37126ddd576374ec5a102f8bc68187af3ad01ca2
"}]
commit_message:
Fixes for cinder backup

1) cinder was using cindernative_vol_id instead of cinder_vol_id
2) cinder client has default endpoint 'publicURL' and should be respected if no new endpoint was provided
3) cinder restore had wrong order of arguments in restore_cinder and restore_cinder_by_glance
4) cinder upload_to_image returns response tuple instead of image, now extracts id from tuple and gets image
5) glance data length sometimes 0, changed to get size from glance.images.get
6) fix validator to allow restore and backup cinder and cinder_native without any path

Change-Id: I37126ddd576374ec5a102f8bc68187af3ad01ca2

commit_message:
Create openstack/puppet-openstack-release-tools

We're currently using some scripts (Python, bash) that are located to
different gist or github places.

For consistency and to help Puppet OpenStack release process, we need a
repository where we could host our tools that will be used for release
management.

Change-Id: Ib8087494c366aac8e70b045c47c0f74dc3e186fd

commit_message:
Add/Remove the volume BDMs during resize

During resize instance migrate_disk_and_power_off should release
the existing volumes connected to the instance. Volume BDMS should
be disconnected and re-connected during finish_migrations. This is
required because manager terminates the prev volumes and
re-initializes the volumes again, which can lead to a new SCSI ID.

Change-Id: I9af2b16259dd98332c135b1870386c827d3c56d7
Closes-Bug: #1510235
(cherry picked from commit 49fca0baa73b63fed67b50ff58bb15c21105f6ca)
